overview.title: T500 Smart Watch
overview.summary: The future of health is in your wrist. It works as your fitness tracker as well as your mini phone.

features.intro: Let's just admit apple smart watch is highly overpriced, you deserve better value for your money. Introducing Fitwiseâ„¢ smartwatch which is not only affordable but supports all major fetaures.

benefits.title: Pedometer
benefits.body: Track your physical activitiy throughout the day and motivates you adopt a healthy lifestyle.

benefits.title: Real-Time Heart Rate Monitor
benefits.body: Helps you keep track of your heart rate througout different activities and make sure that it is within range.

benefits.title: Blood Pressure Monitor
benefits.body: Keeps an eye on your blood pressure and timely notifies you if its out of healthier range.

benefits.title: 12 Sports Mode
benefits.body: Allows you to track your goals and activities for 12 sport modes. Helps you keep discipline and get organized.

benefits.title: Intelligent Sleep Monitoring
benefits.body: Helps you develope better sleep habits by tracking your sleep quality thus you can be more energetic each day.

benefits.title: Sedentary Reminder
benefits.body: Sitting all day long is bad for health. It reminds you to take a break for your health by giving you vibration on your wrist.

benefits.title: Mobile Notifications
benefits.body: Helps you to read your mobile notifications without acually raching out to your phone.

benefits.title: Repalceable Straps
benefits.body: You can use your favoutire 22mm watch straps by replacing the original ones.

benefits.title: Waterproof
benefits.body: You can wear this watch while bathing, outside in the rain or swimming in the pool. It's IP68 waterproof resistant.

faqs.question: Does it have any other color than black?
faqs.answer: The original version of this watch only comes in black color. However, you can use any 22mm starp with this watch to give it a personalised look.

faqs.question: How long is the battery life?
faqs.answer: The battery lasts as long as 14 days with 24-hour heart rate monitoring. It has a stable standby time of 20 days.

faqs.question: Does it work with both Android and iOS?
faqs.answer: Yes, the watch works with both Android and iOS. You can download it's companion software from Google Play or App Store.

faqs.question: Does it have built-in GPS tracker?
faqs.answer: No, this version of the watch does not have built-in GPS tracker. You've to have your phone with you to use it's tracker functionality.

faqs.question: Can we use it to attend or make calls?
faqs.answer: No, you cannot make or attend calls with this watch. However, you can receive message and call alerts.

faqs.question: Do you offer a money back gurantee?
faqs.answer: Yes, we do offer money back gurantee once you return the watch back to us.
